posts.post_content:
Paying strong prices for these postcard issues along with any other rare postcards.  

E & S Publishing Co., Topping & Co., Max Stein, Novelty Cutlery, Larry Semon Evening Sun, Steel Tubes, RPPCs, Detroit Free Press, Wolverine,  Etc...

I have cards to trade and cash.  My email is [url]jcclarkee@hotmail.com[/url].  

Thanks

Friendly bump and thanks for a couple of private deals that were made.  I Was the under bidder on a couple items on my above list in recent auctions.   So, if you have a Cobb postcard or RPPC of him please give me a shot at buying it or at least driving in the price as I'm willing to pay or trade well for items I need included duplicates I like.

[quote name="Bicem" post=1701449]I'll pay 10% more.[/QUOTE]

Only if JC doesn't know about the card being available for sale or trade.  Then you might be able to get it at a discount and 10% more than the "other" guy.

Here's some Cobb RPPCs I'd consider selling.  

[url=https://flic.kr/p/6kUUPT][img]https://farm4.staticflickr.com/3550/3507120793_4a5cb8e497_o.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=https://flic.kr/p/6kZ4js][img]https://farm4.staticflickr.com/3392/3507929810_37d8616946_o.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=https://flic.kr/p/7DsdER][img]https://farm3.staticflickr.com/2464/4361966493_66e49004e1_o.jpg[/img][/url]

[quote name="823dek" post=1702686]Always the best ![/QUOTE]

keep em coming.  

Thank you Jeff

great looking PCs!
I need to get a Cobb .... even a T206!

[quote name="Neal" post=1703033]great looking PCs!
I need to get a Cobb .... even a T206![/QUOTE]

Neal,

You should buy Jeff's cards if available!
